document.full_text: an angry andy murray screamed at the sky. he shook his head and muttered a bad word. he took a swing at the bottom of his sneaker. nothing could shake murray from his post-australian open slump.
document.title: murray loses to 118th-ranked player in sony tennis
lines_and_colors: an angry andy murray screamed at the sky. he shook his head and muttered a bad word. he took a swing at the bottom of his sneaker. nothing could shake murray from his post-australian open slump.
